        public void setShadowRadius(int dimenResId)
        Sets the shadow radius of the FloatingActionButton and invalidates its layout.
        Parameters:
        dimenResId - the resource identifier of the dimension

      • setShadowRadius

        public void setShadowRadius(float shadowRadiusDp)
        Sets the shadow radius of the FloatingActionButton and invalidates its layout.

        Must be specified in density-independent (dp) pixels, which are then converted into actual pixels (px).

        Parameters:
        shadowRadiusDp - shadow radius specified in density-independent (dp) pixels

      • getShadowRadius

        public int getShadowRadius()

      • setShadowXOffset

        public void setShadowXOffset(int dimenResId)
        Sets the shadow x offset of the FloatingActionButton and invalidates its layout.
        Parameters:
        dimenResId - the resource identifier of the dimension

      • setShadowXOffset

        public void setShadowXOffset(float shadowXOffsetDp)
        Sets the shadow x offset of the FloatingActionButton and invalidates its layout.

        Must be specified in density-independent (dp) pixels, which are then converted into actual pixels (px).

        Parameters:
        shadowXOffsetDp - shadow radius specified in density-independent (dp) pixels

      • getShadowXOffset

        public int getShadowXOffset()

        public void setShadowYOffset(float shadowYOffsetDp)

        shadowYOffsetDp - shadow radius specified in density-independent (dp) pixels

        true if FloatingActionButton is hidden, false otherwise

      • show

        public void show(boolean animate)
        Makes the FloatingActionButton to appear and sets its visibility to View.VISIBLE
        Parameters:
        animate - if true - plays "show animation"

      • hide

        public void hide(boolean animate)
        Makes the FloatingActionButton to disappear and sets its visibility to View.INVISIBLE
        Parameters:
        animate - if true - plays "hide animation"

      • setElevationCompat

        public void setElevationCompat(float elevation)
        Sets the shadow color and radius to mimic the native elevation.

        API 21+: Sets the native elevation of this view, in pixels. Updates margins to make the view hold its position in layout across different platform versions.

      • setIndeterminate

        public void setIndeterminate(boolean indeterminate)

        Change the indeterminate mode for the progress bar. In indeterminate mode, the progress is ignored and the progress bar shows an infinite animation instead.

        Parameters:
        indeterminate - true to enable the indeterminate mode
